channel.title: Keefers's Campaign on
channel.description: Recent content in Keefers's Campaign on

item.title: A Lost Friend
item.description: 3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’s closest friends Therapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.

item.title: A Search in the Stars
item.description: Myrrdin’s uncle Nikephoros completed his own A’lawdrinaieth nearly 12 years ago by scaling the sheer cliffs that line the edge of the The Forlorn Shiver until he reached the very bottom, scraping against sky itself.

item.title: A Strange Encounter at Depths
item.description: Myrrdin and Therapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.

item.title: A'lawdrinaieth
item.description: An A’lawdrinaieth is a trial or challenge, that many people of the Brethyn Noswaith attempt during young adulthood. The trial usually consists of a long, open-ended, exploratory mission that culminates in the discovery of knowledge with scientific or cultural significance and to uncover mysteries of the Noswaith’s past, their origin’s on the forlorn shiver, and their connection with the stars.

item.title: Admiral Armedia Quinn
item.description: Founder of Gramerai.

item.title: Althar
item.description: Althar fucked Lauzon. He also conquered Pytax and became the father of magic. Casting a spell so powerful (The Shrinkifying) that many creatures were shrunk and formed completely new (smaller) races.

item.title: Aragi
item.description: Dragonborn leader of the Stormwind Clan. Huge asshole, and really hates the halfling leader Mr Nairo. Lives in a large wooden baracks within Candle Stone.

item.title: Arcane Academy
item.description: Located in the Mountains to the North of Gramerai

item.title: Assasinate Lord Sparding
item.description: Hariotte Sparding asked us to travel to the Knuckle Mountains in order to retake the Sparding Family Castle from the undead.

item.title: Boney Mire
item.description: Site of the Battle of the Boney Mire. A swamp like area in the centre of Gramerai which was overrun with undead.

item.title: Brethyn Noswaith
item.description: The tip of The Forlorn Shiver, is home to an old civilization of men and women who call themselves Brethyn Noswaith.

item.title: Candle Stone
item.description: Candle Stone is the capital city of the island of Gramerai, and was the only area able to withstand the effects of the Grave Winter.

item.title: Captain Amara
item.description: 3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’s closest friends Therapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.

item.title: Chronicle of the First Light and the Stars
item.description: This was the fable from Myrrdin’s youth that rang most true to him. The Elemental Primordials having no eyes had no need for light.

item.title: Chronicle of the Founding
item.description: Before there was man or women, beast or burden, and even before the so-called First Born, there were the Elemensus Primeval.

item.title: Cloud Sea
item.description: The world has long since been shattered, and now fragments of what remains float in an endless sky known as the Cloud Sea.

item.title: Condripitus Wex
item.description: A first generation Gnome and member of the Quill Society. Sent the Party on a task to some ruins to the north of Rifton to recover some ancient draconic artifacts from the First Age.

item.title: Crouchfield
item.description: Member of the Light Crusade and one of the leaders of the military attempting to free Gramerai from the undead caused by the Grave Winter.

item.title: Deities
item.description: %% Begin Waypoint %% Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver Elemental Primordials First Born %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Diadara
item.description: Diadara was a powerful mage and founding member of the Quill Society and the Arcane Academy. She was first mentioned by Condripitus Wex.

item.title: Dyn Ilosgi
item.description: Tells the story of the Dyn Ilosgi.

item.title: Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver
item.description: The Eidolons of the Elemensus Primeval are all that remain of the once great Titans. There presence stretches far and wide across the Cloud Sea but are particularly active on The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Elemental Primordials
item.description: Before there was man or women, beast or burden, and even before the so-called First Born, there were the Elemensus Primeval.

item.title: Eyre Chthonic
item.description: Tells the story of the Eyre Chthonic.

item.title: Fellkirk Skryne
item.description: Related to Captain Skryne. Located in the Lower Green.

item.title: First Born
item.description: Fought and largely destroyed the Elemental Primordials in a great calamitous battle.

item.title: Gramerai
item.description: Gramerai is a large island floating within the Cloud Sea. It was the central point hit by a large winter storm known as the Grave Winter, which brought large amounts of undead soldiers to the island, leaving it uninhabitable.

item.title: Grand Lighthouse
item.description: The Grand Lighthouse is a large lighthouse that stands along the southern edge of the city of Candle Stone. It is the subject of religious warship by members of the Light Crusade.

item.title: Grave Winter
item.description: The Grave Winter was a terrible winter storm that swept the island of Gramerai. It lasted for around 5 years, and in that time it brought thousands of undead and decimated the population of the island, except for the city of Candle Stone.

item.title: Gwneaud O Ddŵr
item.description: Tells the story of the Gwneaud O Ddŵr.

item.title: Hearthen
item.description: 1 2 x = await dv.io.load("Templates/Region - Quests.md"); dv.paragraph(x); %% Begin Waypoint %% %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Help the Dwarves Retake the Mine
item.description: One of the Dwarves we met at the Boney Mire asked us to help recover their iron mine in the Mountains to the North.

item.title: Hide and Seek
item.description: Myrrdin learned a little from the crew of the airship that he landed on. The human empire lives on a far away shard known has Hearthen.

item.title: Human Kingdom
item.description: The human empire lives on a far away shard known has Hearthen. The human king, a spoiled and lazy scion of a powerful line, has recently been overthrown by his younger sister.

item.title: Iron Choker of Detect Undead
item.description: A choker of cold black iron, set with three studs of polished steel. The wearer may use their action to sense undead until the end of their current turn, determining in generalities the presence and direction to any undead within 500 ft.

item.title: Knuckle Mountains
item.description: The knuckle mountains are small mountain range on the east side of the Shard of Gramerai.

item.title: Light Crusade
item.description: The light Crusade is a religion founded upon the undying flame of the Grand Lighthouse which saved Candle Stone from the advancement of the Grave Winter.

item.title: Lower Green
item.description: Area to the south of Candle Stone.

item.title: Lynn Ail-Lenwi
item.description: A Beautiful and crystal clear lake which plunges to depths never before explored, some say these depths are a portal to a far off world entirely submerged in water.

item.title: Mr Nairo
item.description: Kobold Chief Counsellor. Has Major beef with Aragi, leader of the Stormwind Clan.

item.title: Myrrdin Chosaach
item.description: Appearance Appearance: Myrrdin Chosach is a 19yr old humanoid male with sky blue skin. Soft patches of white undulate around his exterior almost giving the illusion of clouds rolling across his person.

item.title: Nikephoros
item.description: Nikephoros is a high ranking member in the Noswaith society and is one of few Ymarferydd on the isle of The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Noswaith Observatory
item.description: The Noswaith Observatory is located on the highest point on The The Forlorn Shiver atop Mount Chiron and is used by the Brethyn Noswaith to study the stars.

item.title: Party
item.description: %% Begin Waypoint %% Lawry Myrrdin Chosaach Pyre Sneap Typhoon %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Primevil Speakers
item.description: The Primevil Speakers are a group of 5 elders who function as the leadership of the Brethyn Noswaith upon The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Pyre
item.description: The leader of the Blackblade Tribe, and close with his servant Sneap.

item.title: Quests
item.description: In Progress 1 2 3 LIST FROM #quests/in-progress SORT file.mtime DESCENDING To Do 1 2 3 LIST FROM #quests/todo SORT file.

item.title: Quill Society
item.description: A society of mages that began the construction of the Arcane Academy.

item.title: Retake the Wineforth Estate
item.description: We were tasked by a member of the wineforth family to retake the Wineforth Estate. The Wineforth Family is quite wealthy.

item.title: Rhedwr Gwynt
item.description: Tells the story of the Rhedwr Gwynt.

item.title: Rifton
item.description: Rifton is a smaller shard floating in the Cloud Sea not too far from the island of Gramerai. 1 2 x = await dv.

item.title: Shards
item.description: Hooks In Progress 1 2 3 4 LIST FROM #hooks/in-progress WHERE any(map(file.outlinks, (x) => contains(x.file.path, this.file.folder))) SORT file.mtime DESCENDING To Do 1 2 3 4 LIST FROM #hooks/todo WHERE any(map(file.

item.title: Shrinkifying
item.description: Full size races were shrunk into smaller races by Althar on Pytax. Original Race New Race Dragonborn Kobolds Elves Gnomes Humans Halflings

item.title: Sneap
item.description: A loyal member of the Blackblade Tribe and devout follower of his king, Pyre.

item.title: Sparding Family
item.description: Rich noble family with a large castle in the Knuckle Mountains of Gramerai.

item.title: The Chronicle of Earth
item.description: Tells the story of the Eyre Chthonic.

item.title: The Chronicle of Fire
item.description: Tells the story of the Dyn Ilosgi.

item.title: The Chronicle of Water
item.description: Tells the story of the Gwneaud O Ddŵr.

item.title: The Chronicle of Wind
item.description: Tells the story of the Rhedwr Gwynt.

item.title: The Forlorn Shiver
item.description: Myrrdin Chosaach, born upon one of the oldest and most ancient Shards referred to by its denizens as The Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Therapydd
item.description: Therapydd was one of Myrrdin Chosaach’s life long friends from a young age. Myrrdin and Therapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.

item.title: Typhoon
item.description: tags: race/dragonborn

item.title: Victor Molgo
item.description: Envoy from the Human Kingdom.

item.title: Wineforth Family
item.description: Rich wine making family on Gramerai. Hired the Party to “discretely” retake their estate to the east of Candle Stone.

item.title: world entirely submerged in water
item.description: Perhaps Lynn Ail-Lenwi leads to this place. 1 2 x = await dv.io.load("Templates/Region - Quests.md"); dv.paragraph(x); %% Begin Waypoint %%

item.title: Ymarferydd
item.description: The Ymarferydd make up a select few members of the Brethyn Noswaith who can speak directly to the Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver.
